steps.title: Draw a stick figure of a soccer player in a kicking position.
steps.content: Draw a stick figure of a soccer player in a kicking position. Take note of joint locations.

steps.title: Add volume to your stick figure.
steps.content: Add volume to your stick figure.

steps.title: Draw his uniform.
steps.content: Draw his uniform. Usually, it is a shirt and shorts. Draw the socks and shoes.

steps.title: Draw the details to the face and hair.
steps.content: Draw the details to the face and hair. Sketch a soccer ball.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing.

steps.title: Draw a stick figure of your soccer player in guarding position.
steps.content: Draw a stick figure of your soccer player in guarding position. Take note of joint locations. Also remember that since he is the Goalkeeper, his stance should be slightly widened.

steps.title: Add volume to your stick figure.
steps.content: Add volume to your stick figure.

steps.title: Draw the uniform.
steps.content: Draw the uniform. The top is usually long sleeved. Draw socks that are knee length and soccer shoes.

steps.title: Draw the face and the hands.
steps.content: Draw the face and the hands. Make the hands thick because he is wearing gloves.

steps.title: Draw the hair and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Draw the hair and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing.

steps.title: Using basic shapes, create a skeleton figure of your player and the ball.
steps.content: Using basic shapes, create a skeleton figure of your player and the ball.

steps.title: Roughly sketch the details of the player and ball.
steps.content: Roughly sketch the details of the player and ball.

steps.title: Draw the finer details that represent the portrait, body, clothes and the action of the figure.
steps.content: Draw the finer details that represent the portrait, body, clothes and the action of the figure.

steps.title: Erase the rough sketch lines and finalize the details.
steps.content: Erase the rough sketch lines and finalize the details.

steps.title: Using basic shapes, create a skeleton figure of your player and the ball.
steps.content: Using basic shapes, create a skeleton figure of your player and the ball.

steps.title: Roughly sketch the details of the player and ball.
steps.content: Roughly sketch the details of the player and ball.

steps.title: Draw the finer details that represent the portrait, body, clothes and the action of the figure.
steps.content: Draw the finer details that represent the portrait, body, clothes and the action of the figure.

steps.title: Erase the rough sketch lines and finalize the details.
steps.content: Erase the rough sketch lines and finalize the details.
